## Overall Insights

1. October had the highest unit of sales and revenue
2. January had the lowest unit of sales but March has the lowest revenue. 
3. Chocolate chips bought the most revenue.
4. Total Profit 2.72M
5. Profit per order $`r round(272000/700,1)`.
